sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import papers from "../data/papers.json"; import people from "../data/people.json"; import projects from "../data/projects.json"; export default function Home() { const featuredPapers = [...papers] .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date) - new Date(a.date)) .slice(0, 3); const featuredProjects = [...projects] .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date) - new Date(a.date)) .slice(0, 3); const featuredPeople = [...people].slice(0, 3); // No dates to sort return (

Sequence Analysis and Modeling (SEQAM) Lab

Research at the intersection of sequence modeling, statistical inference, and machine learning at Rutgers University.

Projects Papers People Courses

Recent Papers

{featuredPapers.map((p, idx) => (

{p.title}

{p.authors} ({p.date})

View Paper
))}

Featured Projects

{featuredProjects.map((proj, idx) => (

{proj.title}

{proj.description}

))}

Lab Members

{featuredPeople.map((person, idx) => (

{person.name}

{person.title}

{person.research_interests.join(', ')}

Profile
))}
); }
